level.heading: Allocation of bond issuing authority.
level.text: All of the authority of the District government to issue qualified mortgage bonds in each calendar year under the Mortgage Subsidy Bond Tax Act of 1980 (26 U.S.C. § 1100 et seq.) as it may be amended from time to time with respect to the District is allocated to the Agency.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-28, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-2701.02.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: The Mortgage Subsidy Bond Tax Act of 1980 is codified as notes under 26 U.S.C. §§ 1, 103A, and 141, not as 26 U.S.C. § 1100 et seq.
